title: No one is connecting.
body: No one is able to connect. Im getting a lever buster even though i never leave games intentionally and i as well as others are having a problem with the server, it is not fair to punish us for poor game design please look into this.

replies.body:
Thanks for bringing these disconnections to our attention! We've become aware of the issue, and at this point it should be resolved. You can follow our post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues) to get more information on the matter. 

We are still working to remedy the effects of the issue, and as always appreciate your patience ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WQXxXG3x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-03-13T22:45:29.253+0000)

> Thanks for bringing these disconnections to our attention! We've become aware of the issue, and at this point it should be resolved. You can follow our post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues) to get more information on the matter. 
> 
> We are still working to remedy the effects of the issue, and as always appreciate your patience ^_^!

It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?

Same here.
I cannot connect to games. Keep getting the "Failed to Connect": "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."
Retrying and restarting the LoL client does not resolve this. My internet is just fine, so that is not the issue.
I appreciate the Riot might be having issues with their servers, but I do not see why I should get a leaverbuster penalty because I tried to connect to a couple of games before Riot could resolve their server issues.
im having the same exact issue, it has yet to be resolved & my leaverbuster penalty just keeps getting refreshed
